Appearance door surface in good condition

2 mugs overturned with coaster (for Lake Wing)?
TV channel all correct and clear

Surface free from stains or sticky stains
1 Bible, Environment Card, Telephone Directory, Amenity Card, Room Attendant’s Card, Asmara Spa Tent Card, TV remote?
